page.t: \033RADS - LU Guild Edition:\033X\nSelect homebase settings, rename ships for the docked ships at this carrier. Ships will be renamed and missile settings applied.
Send multiple ships to sell wares from the carrier
Send multiple ships to buy a given amount of a ware to the nearest factory
Send a wing to defend something

Send a wing to attack a ship or a factory. Two different modes available:
 \033W1.\033X Use \033Bfighter\033X wing.
 \033W2.\033X Use \033Bbomber\033X wing.

Hotkey usage:
 Hit hotkey \033W1X\033X: Use \033Bfighter\033X wing.
 Hit hotkey \033W2X\033X: Use \033Bbomber\033X wing.

Clean the sector from all enemy activity. Three different modes available:
 \033W1.\033X Use \033Bfighter\033X wings only.
 \033W2.\033X Use \033Bbomber\033X wings only.
 \033W3.\033X Use \033Bfighter\033X AND \033Bbomber\033X wings.

Hotkey usage:
 Hit hotkey \033W1X\033X: Use \033Bfighter\033X wings only.
 Hit hotkey \033W2X\033X: Use \033Bbomber\033X wings only.
 Hit hotkey \033W3X\033X: Use \033Bfighter\033X AND \033Bbomber\033X wings.
All ships with this homebase assigned will dock here. Distant jumpdrive equipped ships will try to jump to the carrier.
Available docked ships will undock and defend your carrier. Wing size is to be adjusted in the tactical setup menu. Max. 3 wings are to be deployed via fast tapping the hotkey.
Setup Anarkis Defense Station on this station.
Enable a defensive mode for the station, it will send wings against incomings (and repair its docked ships over time)

This menu will give you the possibility to adjust everything related to ADS - RWE:
 - Fighter management
 - Repair management
 Personnel management
 - Tactical behaviour
 - Ware supply management
 - Automated fighter upgrading

Automated Mode. The Carrier will patrol the sector it is currently in, defend itself and send wings to engage enemies.\nAdjust ship numbers of offensive, defensive and bomber wings in carriers tactical menu.\nOptional, multiple sectors can be defined, which will be successively patrolled.

page.title: ACC
page.t: \033RADS - LU Guild Edition v%s:\033X Anarkis Defense System
[author][b]Anarkis Federation[/b][/author][b]Anarkis Defense System - LU Guild Edition[/b] v%s successfully installed!
[author][b]Anarkis Federation[/b][/author][b]Anarkis Defense System - LU Guild Edition[/b] successfully upgraded to v%s!
[author][b]ADS - %s[/b][/author] You cannot use this command on your playership.
[author][b]Anarkis Federation[/b][/author][b]Anarkis Defense System[/b] has been removed from the game.\nPlease save your game now, exit and run the `uninstall acc.bat` file in your X3 folder.
No threat detected within the %s kilometers security distance, no Defense wing will be launched!
No threat detected within the %s kilometers security distance, %s returning to hangar!
Override default wing sizes on attack jobs with custom ones?
No threat detected, %s returning to carrier!
Target invalid, no attack wing will be launched!
No valid target detected in sector %s, wing start clearance not granted!
No ADS fighters found ready for combat! Check hangar settings, operation aborted.
Select the amount of ship used for defense purpose
Select how attack ships will target enemy ships
Display a warning message when the carrier is in danger ?

This menu allow you to choose what is the minimum threat level that trigger a launch of fighters. To understand how the level system work, you`ll need to know the "threat" values used for each kind of ship and you should also know that the carrier will always send ships if an enemy M1/M2 ship is spotted. Fighter drones are ignored.
Select the fuel resupply quantity in jumps
Do you want to enabled the autojump feature on docked ships ?
Do you want to enabled the emergency jump feature on docked ships ?
Set the emergency shield threshold in percent
Set the missile usage in percent
Select a new radar range in meters
Select the new delay in seconds
\033YDo you really want to uninstall\033X \033RADS - LU\033X \033Y?\033X
No ADS bombers found ready for combat! Check hangar settings, operation aborted.
%s is a foe, defensive wings only available for friendly or neutral targets!
Overview of the mechanics crew aboard \033Y%s\033X

Mechanics will repair, if allowed to, the %s itself, as well as damaged fighters docked aboard \033W%s\033X. You can hire mechanics, for a cost, at any friendly trading station.
When off duty, or when sleeping, they will cost you \033Y1200\033W credits\033X per hour and mechanic.
When repairing a ship, or in training, \033Y7200 \033Wcredits\033X. The more mechanics you have, they faster your ships will be repaired.

\033W- Current off-duty cost: \033Y%s \033Wcredits per hour
\033W- Current on-duty cost: \033Y%s \033Wcredits per hour\033X
You currently have : \033Y%s\033X mechanics (off duty cost : \033Y%s\033X credits per hour)
Allow mechanics to repair docked ships \033R<\033X \033Y%s\033X \033R>\033X
To hire a new mechanic will cost you 50.000 credits. Are you sure ?
You do not have enough money to hire a new mechanic.
You need a friendly Trading Station in the carrier current sector.
How many mechanics do you want to hire?
Hiring \033Y1\033X new mechanic will cost you \033Y50.000\033X credits. Are you sure ?
Hiring \033Y%s\033X new mechanics will cost you \033Y%s\033X credits. Are you sure ?
You do not have enough money to hire %s new mechanics.
How many mechanics do you want to fire? Currently employed: \033Y%s\033X
Select the ships you want to be used by ACC commands
Apply homebase to all docked ships
Apply homebase to active ships only
This is where you can move cargo between your carrier and its docked ships
Load wares from %s to docked ships
Unload wares from docked ships to %s
Allow carrier to buy back destroyed fighters \033R<\033X \033Y%s\033X \033R>\033X
Allow carrier to repair at SY \033R<\033X \033Y%s\033X \033R>\033X
Allow carrier to keep ships supplied \033R<\033X \033Y%s\033X \033R>\033X
Move wares from docked ships to carrier.
Add a faction to the list
Allows to mass rename your docked ships.
[author][b]Anarkis Carrier Commands[/b][/author] [b]Warning:[/b] Your [b]%s[/b] in sector [b]%s[/b] is in danger and could request your attention.
[author][b]Anarkis Carrier Commands[/b][/author] [b]Canceled:[/b] You don`t have enough ships in %s for this command
[author][b]Anarkis Carrier Commands[/b][/author] [b]Canceled:[/b] You don`t have enough ships in %s to clean a sector. At least 5 are needed.
[author][b]Anarkis Carrier Commands[/b][/author] [b]Error:[/b] Not enough wares in cargo bay to equip any ship.
[author][b]Anarkis Carrier Commands[/b][/author] [b]Success:[/b] %s has equiped %s/%s ships with %s %s.
[author][b]Anarkis Carrier Commands[/b][/author] [b]Canceled:[/b] %s - No station in range has enough %s.
Same quantity to all ships [quantity = max value]
At least quantity wares to each ship
Select the ware you want to move
Wares transferred to: \033Y%s\033X ID: \033W%s\033X Cargo bay space: \033G%s\033X / %s
Select the missile you want to add

This is a list of compatible wares for the ship type %s. Choose a ware and set its resupply quantity for this ship type. \033Y%s\033X docked at \033Y%s\033X will be resupplied according to the given amounts. Green typed amounts are available in carriers cargo bay.
Cargo space needed for given thresholds:\033W %s\033X units
Cargo space needed for wares:\033W %s\033X units

This is a list of compatible wares for the ship type %s. Choose a ware and set its resupply quantity for this ship type. \033Y%s\033X docked at \033Y%s\033X will be resupplied according to the given amounts. Green typed amounts are available aboard station.

This is a list of wares transportable by the ship type \033Y%s\033X. Choose a ware and set its resupply quantity for this ship type. \033Y%s\033X docked at \033Y%s\033X will be resupplied according to the given amounts. Green typed amounts are available in carriers cargo bay.

\033CA L E R T - A D S mechanics section - A L E R T\033X 

 ADS noticed a money shortage on your account. Repairs cancelled. Fund increase recommended. 

Your current account: \033Y%s\033X 
Total off duty mechanic section cost per minute: \033Y%s\033X 
Your money will last: \033Y%s\033X minutes

\033RA L E R T !! - A D S mechanics section - A L E R T !!\033X 

 \033YADS noticed a severe money shortage on your account! When your account reaches zero, all mechanics will refuse to stay aboard and leave immediately! Immediate fund increase on your account recommended!\033X 

Your current account: \033Y%s\033X 
Total off duty mechanic section cost per minute: \033Y%s\033X 
Your money will last: \033Y%s\033X minutes
\033R- A D S mechanics section -\033X \n\nOk, that`s it! All of your crew members on \033Y%s\033X have fled due to money shortage. Have a nice day!
This command allows your carrier to sell its wares to the stations around using its docked ships. There is no check for enemy sectors so set your range carefully.
Select a ware to be added
This command allows your carrier to buy wares from the stations around using its docked ships. There is no check for enemy sectors so set your range carefully.
Transfer of crew member \033W%s\033X from \033W%s\033X to \033W%s\033X failed.\n\n
Swapping of crew member \033W%s\033X from \033W%s\033X to \033W%s\033X failed.\n\n
Only \033R%s\033X of \033W%s %s\033X were transferred from \033W%s\033X to \033W%s\033X.\n\n
Only \033R%s\033X of \033W%s %s\033X swapped duty from \033W%s\033X to \033W%s\033X.\n\n
%sReason: Maximum number of \033W%s\033X aboard \033W%s\033X has been reached \(max. \033W%s\033X\)
Failed to protect %s, object was destroyed. %s returning to carrier!
Apply current settings to all carriers
Setup %s behaviour and it`s owned active ADS fighters

\033WReport From:\033X %s | \033WClass:\033X %s
\033WLocation:\033X %s | \033WThreat Level: \033X%s

\033WAlert:\033X \033YThreat could not be engaged !
\033X
Reason: Not enough ADS fighters ready for combat.
\033WNeeded fighters for building an offensive wing:\033X \033Y%s\033X\n\033WFighters available:\033X \033Y%s\033X\nAdvice: \033GCheck hangars!\033X
This menu gives you access to all \033YADS compatible\033X assets

Setup default behaviour of your %s and their owned active ADS fighters. Remember, that changes will only affect new %s you buy or aquire AFTER saving changes. If you want to apply changes to ALL of your %s, you need to \033YApply \033Ydefault \033Ysettings \033Yto \033Yall \033Y%s\033X in the \033RADS\033X \033WManager\033X menu two levels above.
\033W- There are \033Y%s \033Wmarines on board signed in for next training unit\033X
No marines aboard %s at the moment
No suitable ships docked at the moment
No mechanics or marines aboard %s at the moment
Set resupply amounts and / or load wares to ships
< \033RDelete resupply settings of ALL ship types\033X >
< \033RDelete resupply settings of this ship type\033X >
No suitable ships docked, that could be used as storage ships

Resupply settings overview. List of ship types and according resupply amounts of displayed wares. %s will set resupply thresholds on all %s according to the list below. When docked, those ships will be resupplied with displayed wares, if %s has this ware in cargo bay. Moreover, the options given in the ship setup menu will be constantly applied.
Are you sure to remove resupply settings from all ship types?
Available mechanics aboard \033W%s\033X. Choose a mechanic to employ.
Total Repair Ratio: \033W%s\033X Total Price: \033W%s\033X credits
\033W- Time remaining until next training unit:\033X
\033W- There is 1 marine training on board\033X
Needed total volume for all items to be equipped: [\033G%s\033X]
\033WThreshold manager active on this carrier, tactical settings will\n\033X\033Wconstantly be applied to:\033X \033Y%s\033X
Threshold manager active on this ship < \033RSTOP\033X >
Auto unload any other ware not specified to be resupplied - active ships only! %s

Choose ships to be upgraded as well as upgrades for these ships. Carrier \033Y%s\033X will collect ships if necessary and ferry them from equipment dock to equipment dock until all ships are fitted out with desired upgrades.
The sectors trading station has to be no more than %s km away from your %s to beam hired mechanics aboard.
This trading station has no more mechanics aboard. Come back later, or try your luck at another trading station.
[author][green]Anarkis Federation - Auto Upgrade Ships[/green][/author][center]%s \33YFinished work!!\33X[/center]\n\nFollowing ships were upgraded:
[author][green]Anarkis Federation - Auto Upgrade Ships[/green][/author][center]%s \33YDid not upgrade any ship!!\33X[/center]\n\n
\n\nFollowing ships could not be docked because of \33Rdocking bay shortage\33X:
\nPlease free some bays and repeat auto prep order to have this ships upgraded too!
\n\nFollowing ships could not be docked because they \33Rdid not fit in any docking bay\33X, and were not upgraded:
\n\n\33YOperation was halted, because %s lacks free docking bays, please free some bays, then resume!!\33X
Event log for carrier %s regarding upgrading of ships.\nSpent money for upgrading ships: \033R%s\033X cr
%s does not have a Cargo Life-support System aboard!
No mechanics available due to air shortage
%s cargo bay full. Free some cargo space, then try again.
Move wares from your carrier to docked ships.
\033RThe maximum number of marines has been reached. Some of the marines to be transferred were divided to the mechanics section\033X
Carrier: \033W%s\n\033RCargo bay full! Transfer of wares halted!\033X\nOnly \033Y%s\033X of \033Y%s\033X ships were unloaded!
Carrier: \033W%s\n\033RCargo bay full! Transfer of wares halted!\033X\nTotal ships unloaded: \033Y%s\033X, last ship could not be entirely unloaded!
\033RSome ships were not fully equipped due to lack of cargo bay space on respective ships!
Ships were not fully equipped due to shortage of following wares:
\033RFollowing wares are not aboard the carrier:
The desired amount of following wares could only be partially loaded due to carrier shortage:
Carrier: \033W%s\033X only \033Y%s\033X of \033G%s\033X ships fully equipped, \033R%s\033X partially or not equipped!!
While equipping, carrier ran out of following wares:
\033RADS\033X assets in range able to share personnel

%s storage settings overview. %s \033Y%s\033X will use docked ships as an extra store room for wares. Displayed wares will be stored in %s`s cargo bay until given amounts have been reached. Any surplus or shortage is then evened out by transferring wares to or from the ships defined as store ships.
\033YNote:\033X Storage ships will not be auto unloaded, even if their ship type is set to be auto unloaded in the Resupply Ships Management!
Accumulated total volume available aboard all storage ships
Total volume needed aboard \033Y%s\033X for all storage wares
\033ROnly\033X %s \033Rof\033X %s \033R%s unloaded due to %s cargo bay space shortage!\033X
Only \033R%s\033X of \033G%s\033X \033W%s\033X transferred due to \033Ycargo bay space\033X shortage aboard this ship!
Only \033R%s\033X of \033G%s\033X \033W%s\033X transferred due to \033Ycarrier ware\033X shortage!
Select energy cells resupply quantity. Maximum amount: 1600
Here you see a list of ships docked at \033Y%s\033X, which are suitable for being used as storage ships. Choose one or more ships.
Input up to how many percent storage ships are to be maximally loaded

Here you see a list of wares to be found aboard \033Y%s\033X or aboard any of a storage ship. Wares to be found in carriers cargo bay are typed green. Select ware and define the amount to be held in %s`s cargo bay.
\033YNo storage wares specified. Please add one or more wares to be managed.\033X
\033YNo storage ships specified. Management of wares only possible with suitable ships!\033X

Not able to jump because sector to jump at is not known!? \(%s\)

Not able to jump because auto jump is not activated!

Not able to jump because needed upgrade for jumping is not aboard!

Refuelling failed because of missing Best Buys Locator!
Refuelling skipped because ship does not need any fuel!
Refuelling failed because no station found selling energy cells!

Refuelling failed because of docking %s at %s is not allowed!

No ships require tech upgrades, skipping.
These ships will be served after actual upgrade run, sent to a safe station for now.
